meanings.definition: A place of entertainment open at night for drinking, dancing, and socializing.
meanings.sent1: My friends and I went to the nightclubs to dance and have fun.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy visiting nightclubs on weekends to unwind and socialize.
meanings.sent3: The nightclubs were so crowded that it felt like a big party!
meanings.sent4: The neon lights of the nightclubs beckoned to the revelers like moths to a flame.
meanings.sent5: The atmosphere of the nightclubs was electric, pulsating with energy and excitement.

meanings.definition: The act of going to nightclubs for fun and socializing.
meanings.sent1: Her favorite pastime was the nightclubs, where she could dance and meet new people.
meanings.sent2: After a long week, he looked forward to a night of nightclubs with his friends.
meanings.sent3: She joked that she was a 'nightclubs enthusiast' because she loved going out so much.
meanings.sent4: To her, going to nightclubs was like stepping into a different world, full of music and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of the nightclubs never failed to lift her spirits and make her smile.
